Hexxagon.View

Interface IFaceBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FaceBoard

    public interface IFaceBoard
    Contains method specifications of face view component of game. Instances of classes implementing this interface shows a bulb face symbolising the AI player.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey
